title: BREYLEE Aloe Vera Eye Mask– 60 Pcs - Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles Treatments – Look Younger and Reduce Wrinkles and Fine Lines Undereye, Improve and Firm eye Skin - Pure Natural Material Extraction
descriptions:
Wake up brighter with BREYLEE Aloe Vera Eye Mask. This 60-piece set delivers a spa-worthy under-eye refresh in just 20 minutes—perfect for busy mornings, pre-makeup prep, or a calming night routine.

Why you’ll love it:
- Targets the look of puffy eyes and dark circles for a more rested, radiant appearance.
- Smooths the look of fine lines and wrinkles while helping improve skin firmness.
- Deeply hydrates and refreshes delicate under-eye skin for a plump, dewy finish.
- Non-slip, time-saving design stays put so you can multitask with ease.

Powered by nature:
- Aloe Vera: Soothes, cools, and replenishes moisture for instant comfort.
- Collagen: Helps support skin’s elasticity and a firmer, smoother look.
- Pure natural material extraction for a gentle, skin-friendly experience.

Easy to use:
1) Cleanse face and eyes with warm water.
2) Apply pads under eyes and press gently.
3) Relax for 20 minutes.
4) Remove and lightly pat in the remaining essence—no rinse needed.
Use twice daily or at least once a day for best results.

Feel refreshed, look well-rested, and reveal brighter, smoother under-eyes with BREYLEE Aloe Vera Eye Mask—your daily dose of hydration, firmness, and glow in every pair.
